text: :bulb: Read-only api keys. For production portals.
Just looking for more info on this. Do you happen to have some use cases where you would use this?
Using local dev or writing API's to port information from 1 portal to another... it's a safeguard against accidentally overwriting anything on production.
Or if you don't want to give all devs access to write to production, but they might still need read access
We are working on a solution to this exact problem :eyes:
